definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 7:21 stream of the Nile, stream, canal (Egypt. loan-word = Egypt. ’iotr, ’io’r, watercourse, Copt. eioor, ior; also ’iotr‘o, ’io’r‘o, Copt. eiero, iaro, Nile, Steindorff:BAs i. 612; in As. ia’uru, stream, ’Iaru’û, river Nile, Id:ib., Hpt:ib. 171 Jäger:ib 466)—abs. [[הַיְאׂר]] Ge 41:1 + 37 t.; [[הַיְאוֹר]] Is 19:8; [[הַיְאׂ֫רָה]] Ex 1:22; [[יְאוֹר]] Is 19:7, Is 19:7, Is 19:7 + 2 t.; [[כָּאׂר]] (err. for [[כַּיְאׂר]]) Am 8:8; cstr. [[כִּיאׂר]] Am 9:5; [[כִּיאוֹר]] Am 8:8; sf. [[יְאׂרִי]] Ez Eze 29:3 b (Co [[יאר]], cf. v:Eze 29:9 and SyrVer Targum); pl. [[יְאׂרִים]] Ex 8:1 + 4 t.; cstr. [[יְאׂרֵי]] Is 7:18 + 2 t.; [[יְאוֹרֵי]] 2Ki 19:24; sf. [[יְאׂרֶיְ]] Ez Eze 29:4, Eze 29:4, Eze 29:5 + v:Eze 29:4 (del. LXX Co) + Eze 29:10 (Co [[יְאׂרְְ]]); [[יְאׂרָיו]] Ez Eze 29:3; [[יְאׂדֵיהֶם]] Ex 7:19 Ps 78:44; —

stream of the Nile, river Nile, usu. c. art. Ge 41:1, Ge 41:2, Ge 41:3, Ge 41:3, Ge 41:18, Ex 1:22, Ex 2:3, Ex 2:5, Ex 2:5, Ex 4:9, Ex 4:9, Ex 7:15, Ex 7:17, Ex 7:18, Ex 7:18, Ex 7:18, Ex 7:20, Ex 7:20, Ex 7:21, Ex 7:21, Ex 7:21, Ex 7:24, Ex 7:24, Ex 7:28, Ex 8:5, Ex 8:7, Ex 17:5 (all JE), Am 8:8, Am 9:5, Is 19:7, Is 19:7, Is 19:7, Is 19:8, Is 23:3 (‖[[שִׁחׂר]]), v:Is 23:10, Je 46:7, Je 46:8 (sim. of Egypt. invasion), Ez Eze 29:3 (rd. [[יאר]], v. supr.), v:Eze 29:9, Zec 10:11; more fully [[יְאׂר מִחְרַיִם]] Am 8:8, Am 9:5.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Nile-arms, Nile-canals, [[יְאׂרֵי מִחְרַים]] Is 7:18; [[יְאׂרֵי מָחוֹר]] Is 19:6 (‖[[נְהָרוֹת]]), Is 37:25 = 2Ki 19:24; v. also Na 3:8, Ex 7:19, Ex 8:1 (both P; ‖[[נְהָרׂת]], [[אֲגַמִּים]], etc.), Ps 78:44 (‖[[נׁוְלִים]]), Ez Eze 29:3, Eze 29:4, Eze 29:4, Eze 29:5, Eze 29:10 + v:Eze 29:4 MT (but del. LXX Co), Eze 30:12.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: watercourses in gen., [[יְאׂרִים רַחֲבֵי יׇדָָיִם]] Is 33:21 (‖[[נְהָרִים]]; cf. NH [[יְאוֹר]], late Aram. [[יְאוֹרָא]]).
[[יְאׂר]], sg., of Tigris, Da 12:5, Da 12:5, Da 12:6, Da 12:7 (cf. Da 10:4).
